location: RAIN FOREST, OLYMPIC NATIONAL PARK, WASHINGTON

text: Moss-draped. Shadow-drenched. Tortured tree trunks twist  upward, reaching for rare sunlight.

I'd never given much thought to how I would die.. Suddenly, every creature in the forest is deadly silent. bird, beast nor insect make a noise. A predator is near.  Then, in the distance, hear a tiny SNICK - a twig snappin Abruptly, we're on the move. Fast.

Trees start whipping past us at a dizzying speed, branche are dodged with preternatural agility. And we're speeding up, chasing something. It's exhilarating. Terrifying.  Finally, up ahead, we get the first glimpse of our prey -

-- running for its life as it darts through this maze of  a forest. It sprints forward, but we gain on it. Beyond t SEE the forest's edge ahead, white sunlight glowing again trees. The buck races for the light. We're just behind it about to emerge from the shadowy darkness -

The deer LEAPS into the light in a high arc, hovering (su SLOW MOTION) against the WHITE GLARE of the sun... then B The deer abruptly plummets out of frame at an unnatural a leaving the WHITE GLARE to fill the screen. HOLD ON WHITE
But dying in the place of someone I love seems like a good way to go..
-- Then into the WHITENESS steps the face of -
Eyes closed against the sunlight, absorbing its rays. Lon dark hair frames alabaster skin. She's a vulnerable, introverted, imperfect beauty.
... So I can't bring myself to  regret the decision that brought me  here to die...  The background comes into focus as we realize we're now i 2.
Bella stands at the end of a cul-de-sac on the desert's e The sun blazes behind her -- she bends down and carefully scoops a tiny BARREL CACTUS into a clay pot.
... The decision to leave home. She stares at the cactus in a state of reverie, until

Bye, Bella! BELLA'S POV - McMansion ACROSS THE STREET  Three tanned, athletic, blonde GIRLS hop into a convertib Mercedes. Their flawless, bought-and-paid for beauty cont with Bella's pale naturalness. They wave.
Good luck at your new school!  They ADLIB superficial good wishes, "Don't forget to writ "We'll miss you." Bella waves back, sweetly, but  halfheartedly as she steps off the curb.
Have a good.. --and trips. When she rights herself, they're already gon
... life.  Clearly, not close friends. Bella's grown-up demeanor and innate intelligence become apparent as -

BELLA'S MOTHER, RENE, mid 30's --exits their house --it's low rent for this ritzy neighborhood. Rene is eclectic,  scattered, anxious, more best friend than parent. She  thrusts a cell phone at Bella.
It won't work again, baby.
You put it on hold.
I did?
Look. You also called Mexico. Rene pushes her playfully, they laugh. 3.
I'll figure it out. You gotta be able  to reach me and Phil on the road -
love saying that - on the road.
Very romantic. PHIL, 31, good looking with an athlete's body, exits the house, carrying Bella's three suitcases with ease.

If you call crappy motels, backwater  towns and ballpark hot dogs romantic. He puts his Phoenix Desert Dogs baseball hat on Rene's he a kiss. Phil's love of Rene reassures Bella. Phil heads to station wagon to load the luggage, while Rene slips her a through Bella's, clinging to her as they walk to car.
Now, you know if you change your  mind, I'll race back here from  wherever the game is.  But Rene's strained expression tells us what a great  sacrifice that would be. Bella forces a smile.
I won't change my mind, mom.
You might. You've always hated Forks.

It's not about Forks, it's about  Dad. I mean, two weeks a year, we  barely know each other.  (off Rene's still worried  look) Mom, I want to go. I'll be fine. But as Rene hugs Bella, we see the truth on BELLA'S FACE  dread, doubt, regret. Off Bella, struggling to keep her  facade up as she climbs into the back seat of the car.. .
3 Bella, IPOD earbuds in her ears, gets a last glimpse of t sparkling malls, chic shoppers, manicured cactus gardens.

head_text.subj: PULL UP AND OUT OF THE CAR UNTIL WE'RE -

text: 4 The McMansions get smaller as we SWEEP OVER the scorched  landscape, baking under a hot sun. Beyond the housing  developments SEE the rocky, dry desert, extending for mil
Rise HIGHER, and higher still, until finally we're suspen within the bright, perfect, blue SKY, with only an occasi cloud..
Slowly, the clouds start getting more numerous, thicker,
until we're completely immersed in them... the sun disapp Finally, we EMERGE from the clouds to find below

Nothing but deep, dark, green forests for miles. SWEEP DO finding the eerily dramatic Lake Crescent. Over it all ha the mist from the ever-present cloudy grey sky. Everythin is wet and green and drenched in shade..
FIND A TWO LANE HIGHWAY along which drives A POLICE  CRUISER... PUSH IN on the cruiser until we reach
Bella looks out, taking in her gloomy new surroundings.. .
6 Bella sits next to her uniformed father, police chief CHA SWAN, 40's. Taciturn, introverted like Bella. Their strai silence contrasts Bella's relationship with her mother. B
Your hair's longer.
I cut it since last time I saw you.
Guess it grew out again. She just nods. Silence.
How's your mom?
Good.  More silence. Yikes. They pass a SIGN: The City Of Forks Welcomes You - Pop. 3246. Bella sighs.  5.
7 As the cruiser drives through, Bella takes in this loggin
every storefront has a wood carving. The Timber Museum's two loggers sawing a stump. The POLICE STATION is a small building across from City Hall..
8 The cruiser pulls up to the old two-story house. A woodsh of firewood. There's a small boat in the garage, fishing old buoy. Bella climbs out... home.

9 Bella and Charlie carry in her bags. The house isn't styl (the only new thing here is a Flat Screen T.V.), but it's comfortable, lived-in. Lots of fishing memorabilia; photo of Charlie fishing with Quileute Indian BILLY BLACK.  Handmade cards to Daddy and photos of Bella. She winces a herself, age 7, in a tutu, sitting stubbornly on the grou
I put Grandpa's old desk in your  room. And I cleared some shelves  in the bathroom.
(grimacing) That's right. One bathroom. Bella's eye lands on a PHOTO of a much younger Charlie an Rene, on vacation, beaming with love.
I'll just put these up in your room
I can do it
They both reach for the bags, bumping one another awkward Bella backs off, letting Charlie carry the bags upstairs.

An antique rolltop desk sits in a corner. The room is fil childhood remnants that have seen better days. As she unp CD case, loneliness finally overwhelms her. She sits heav the edge of the bed, tears threatening..
Then we hear a HONK outside. Bella runs across the hall a out the window to see
11 OUTSIDE - A FADED RED TRUCK, CIRCA 1960 pulls up... 11 6.

Bella exits to find Charlie greeting the driver, JACOB BL 16, Quileute Indian, amiable with long black hair, and hi childish roundness in his face. The two of them help Jaco father, BILLY BLACK (from the photos), into a wheelchair.
Bella, you remember Billy Black.
Glad you're finally here. Charlie  hasn't shut up about it since you  told him you were coming.
Keep exaggerating, I'll wheel you  down the hill.
Right after I ram you in the ankles. Billy takes several rolls at Charlie, who dodges. Jacob s his head at their two fathers as he shyly approaches Bell
I'm Jacob. We made mud pies  together when we were little kids.
Yeah... I think I remember.. . (re: the dads) Are they always like this?
It's getting worse with old age. Charlie then pats the hood of the truck, addressing Bella
So what do you think of your  homecoming gift?
No way. The truck is for me?
Just bought it off Billy, here.
I rebuilt the engine and -
It's perfect! 7. She beams. It's the first genuine smile we've seen on her She rushes to the truck. Jacob eagerly joins her.
Okay, so you gotta double pump the  clutch when you shift, but -
He hands her the keys as she climbs in.
Maybe I can give you a ride to school.
I go to school on the reservation.
Too bad. Would've been nice to  know at least one person.  As she starts up the truck we MATCH CUT
Loud, belching and turning heads as Bella parks, mortifie eyes are on her as she climbs out of her truck and steps a  PUDDLE, soaking her sneakers. She slinks toward school, a begin

-- Bella (never without her IPOD) makes her way thru kids stare openly; a few brave ones say hi. They're all talkin about her. This is her hell.  -- Bella wanders the walkways looking for room numbers, l -- Constant stares at Bella, the outsider.. . SERIES ENDS when a sweet, nerd-cute, motor mouth boy, ERI appears in her path.
You're Isabella Swan, the new girl. Hi.  I'm Eric. The eyes and ears of this  place. Anything you need. Tour guide,  lunch date, shoulder to cry on. Bella just looks at him. Is he for real?
I'm kind of the suffer in silence type.
Good headline for your feature
I'm on the paper, and you're news,  baby, front page. 8.
I -- no, I'm not news -- I'm, seriously,  not at all
Whoa, chillax. No feature.
(relieved) Would you mind just pointing me  toward Mr. Varner's class? He leads her away, enjoying the attentive stares, as she from them
You've missed a lot of the semester,  but I can hook you up - tutor, cliff  notes, medical excuse..

The boys' basketball team runs drills on half the basketb court. A girls' volleyball game occupies the other half. Bella, in gym clothes, avoids the volleyball like it's radioactive. An energetic, athletic team captain, JESSICA motivates the players.
Block it, Chloe! Yeah! Good attack!  Unfortunately, the volleyball heads toward Bella. She clo her eyes and flails at it, SMACKING it. It flies off cour
-- and beans a basketball player in the head. He is MIKE  NEWTON, good looking, affable, with blond spiky hair.
Ow!
(hurries to him,  embarrassed) Are you alright? I warned them not  to make me play.
It's only a flesh wound. Mike grins and she smiles, relieved. A BELL RINGS, class
You're Isabella, right?  9.
Just Bella.
I'm Mike. Newton. He looks at her a second too long, clearly taken by her -
Suddenly, Jessica appears, stepping between them. Subtle, but possessive as she nudges Mike.
She's got a great spike, doesn't  she?  (to Bella) So, you're from Arizona, right?  Aren't people supposed to be tan  down there?
That's why they kicked me out. Mike laughs, and because he does, Jessica does. Bella jus feels uncomfortable with the attention.. .
FOLLOW Bella, Mike and Jessica as they carry their trays a  table. Eric appears, and squishes into a seat next to Bel
Mike, you met my home girl Bella.
Your home girl?

(to Bella) It's first grade all over again,  and you're the shiny new toy. Bella smiles awkwardly. Suddenly, a FLASHBULB blinds Bell She looks up at the photographer, ANGELA, Jessica's sweet low key, insecure friend.
Sorry, needed a candid for the feature
Feature's dead, Angela. Don't bring it  up again. (to Bella) I got your back, baby. 10.
(disappointed) Guess we'll just run another editorial on  teen drinking.
Sorry. There's always eating disorders,  or Speedo padding on the swim team
-- Wait, that's a good one.. . But Bella's attention is now riveted to

head_text.subj: THE DOUBLE DOORS OF THE CAFETERIA

text: They swing open as four of the most astounding people Bel ever seen enter (IN SLOW MOTION): THE CULLENS. Two guys, girls, all chalky pale, purplish shadows under their eyes
and all devastatingly beautiful.  They move through the room with effortless grace, and tak at a table furthest from Bella's. Bella leans over to Jes Angela.
Who are they?
The Cullens.  Jessica leans in, swinging into gossip mode.
Doctor and Mrs. Cullen's foster  kids. They all moved down here  from Alaska two years ago.
They kinda keep to themselves.

Because they're all together.  Like, together together. The  blonde girl, Rosalie, and the big  dark-haired guy, Emmett.. . ON ROSALIE, 18, long blonde hair, model beautiful, knows Alongside her is EMMETT, 17, big, brawny, like a weight  lifter, but a playful glint in his eye.
... they're a thing. I'm not even sure that's legal. 11.
Jess, they're not actually related.
But they live together. And the  little dark haired girl, Alice,  she's really weird..
ON ALICE, 17, pixie-like, rail thin, light on her feet wi black hair going in every direction. She hovers over, JAS honey-blond hair, tall, lean, slightly tortured.
... she's with Jasper, the blonde  who looks like he's in pain.
mean, Dr. Cullen's like this foster  dad slash match maker.
Maybe he'll adopt me. Bella laughs, liking her... then sees the last Cullen to
EDWARD, 17. Lanky, with untidy, bronze colored hair. He s inwardly turned, mysterious. More boyish than the others. the most striking of all. Bella can't take her eyes off h
Who's he?
That's Edward Cullen. Suddenly, Edward looks over, as if he heard Jessica from  across the room. His eyes meet Bella's. But he seems..
confused. Bella quickly looks away.
He's totally gorgeous, obviously.  But apparently, no one here is good  enough for him. Like I care.  (she obviously does) Anyway, don't waste your time.
I wasn't planning on it. But Bella can't help but peek at Edward again. He's stari at her outright now, with a slightly frustrated expressio that unnerves Bella. She hides behind her hair.

A room of black-topped lab tables. Two to a table. Bella  and Mike enter.  12. Mike takes his seat and points her toward MR. MOLINA,  Birkenstocked, enthusiastic science teacher at the head o the class. As Bella moves to the teacher with her class  slip, she notes

EDWARD -- his back to her, sitting at a front table. But she passes Edward's table.. . SLOW MOTION -- the breeze she creates when she passes lif a  piece of paper next to Edward. We're still on his back as inhales --then abruptly stiffens. He grabs onto the edge the table, crumbling it slightly. No one notices.  Mr. Molina takes Bella's class slip.
Welcome, Ms. Swan. Follow along as  best you can till you get caught  up.  Mr. Molina gestures to the only empty seat... next to Edw But as Bella approaches, she's taken aback when

ON EDWARD'S FACE -he slowly looks up at her, his eyes coa black with repulsion, fury. If looks could literally kill . Bella knocks someone's book bag off their chair. Replaces mumbling an apology. Then slinks reluctantly into her sea Edward jerks away from her to the extreme edge of his cha
(to the class, animated) Today we'll be observing the behavior  of planaria, a.k.a flatworms. As Mr. Molina distributes two petri dishes per table
We're going to cut them in half,  then watch them regenerate into two  separate worms..

Bella glances at Edward who averts his face, holding a ha his nose as if he smells something horrible.  Bella, shrinking, subtly sniffs the air, smells nothing.  Then she sniffs her hair. It's fine. She's perplexed. Mr. Molina hands Edward two petri dishes.

... Yes, folks, zombie worms! They  just won't die. Edward takes a dish, then slides the second one across th table to Bella as if she had Ebola. She takes her dish, a makes a dark curtain of her hair between them.  13. She can see EDWARD'S HANDS under the table. Clenched into fists. Off Bella, utterly baffled, and deeply insecure.. .
-- as the BELL RINGS, Edward bolts out the door. Other ki and Bella exit a moment later. Bella looks down the hall; he's gone.
Bella enters, but nearly turns and leaves when she sees
EDWARD sweet-talking the enchanted female ADMINISTRATOR,  40's. He doesn't see Bella enter.
There must be something open sixth  period. Physics? Biochem?

No, every class is full. I'm  afraid you'll have to stay in  biology. I'm so sorry.  Bella blanches. The Administrator sees her and gestures f her to wait a minute.  But Edward suddenly straightens as if sensing Bella. He s turns to glare at her with piercing, hate-filled eyes. Sh to the wall, hugging herself, suddenly chilled... with fe
(to the Administrator) I'll just... endure it.  He strides out the door. Off Bella..
Edward climbs into a shiny new silver Volvo with the Cull while Bella, upset, hurries to her truck. The many eyes s watching her add insult to injury. ... Finally, she reach
-- and closes the door. Her eyes well... but she fights i getting mad.
Jerk. As she tries to start the car, choking the engine, we beg hear a MAN'S RAGGED, FRIGHTENED BREATH
Extremely tight on his terrified FACE, sweat dripping, br in short gasps, trying desperately not to make a sound. I

--He's crouched in a dark corner. But then he sees a SHAD move blindingly fast past him. He jerks around, then anot SHADOW flies past, too fast to follow. He BOLTS! He runs up a flight of stairs, harsh lights from the exte the mill striating him. He moves as fast as humanly possi

head_text.subj: ON THE SECURITY GUARD FROM SEVERAL FLOORS B

text: UNKNOWN POV charges after him at an INHUMAN SPEED through maze of pillars and walkways. We dodge skull-crushing bea LEAP from one floor up to the next, up ladders, scaffoldi beams, up, and up, getting closer and closer to
-- who desperately runs for his life, looking over his sh with terror. UNKNOWN POV is closing in on him, but then h BOLTS out a door
-- The guard BURSTS OUT onto a stair landing, but loses h footing and TRIPS, breaking through the rail and pitching over the side, into the air
-- and stops, hovering mid-air, a yard from the landing.
HAND grips his shirt, then YANKS him out of the air and o of frame with incredible strength. His guttural SCREAM is choked short as BLOOD SPRAYS THE LANDING.. .

ON A TOP SIRLOIN STEAK as it is set in front of Charlie. shares a table with Bella. INCLUDE the waitress, CORA, 30 She beams at Bella as she sets a plate of cod in front of Several LOGGERS at the counter offer Bella welcoming smil shrinks in her seat at the attention. Charlie's oblivious
Can't get over how grown up you  are. And so gorgeous.  Bella glances at Charlie, who keeps his eyes on his steak
bearded, hippy logger, WAYLON FORGE, 50, appears behind C leaning over her shoulder to Bella
Member me, honey? I was Santa one year.
Waylon, she hasn't had a Christmas  here since she was four.
Bet I made an impression, though.
You always do.
Let the girl eat her cod, Waylon.  (to Bella) When you're done, I'll bring your  favorite - berry cobbler. Remember?  Your dad still has it. Every Thursday.

(doesn't remember at all) That'd be great, thank you. Cora shoos Waylon away. Left alone now, Charlie and Bella both reach for the salt, knock hands. Charlie goes for th ketchup instead. Silence as they eat.  A burst of LAUGHTER from a nearby happy FAMILY only serve emphasize their discomfort. Bella tries to bridge the gap
So... you eat here every night?
Easier than washing dishes.
I can cook. He looks up, as if confused by the concept.
I do the cooking at home - in Phoenix.  Mom's not great in the kitchen.
I remember..
They both laugh -- recalling an especially bad dinner.
How was school? Meet anyone? 16.
A few people... Do you know the  Cullen family?
(looks up sharply) Are people talking about them again?
No... well, a little.

Just cause they're newcomers. We're  lucky to have a surgeon like Dr.  Cullen at our podunk hospital. Lucky  his wife wanted to live in a small  town. Lucky his kids aren't like  a  lot of the hell-raisers around here.
... Okay.
I just don't like narrow mindedness.  And he returns to his food. Silence.
Bella looks out at the fog as she talks on the phone.  RENE (O.S.
If spring training goes well, we could  be living in Florida permanently.
Please insert 25 cents to continue.
Mom, where's your cell?
Rene talks on a pay phone, her dead cell phone in her han In the b.g., Phil and an Attendant work on the Subaru eng
Ok, I didn't lose my power cord. It  ran away. Screaming. I literally  repel technology now. 17. Bella smiles, missing her mom. Rene feeds the phone  quarters.
Now, tell me more about your  school, baby. What are the kids  like? Are there any cute guys?  Are they being nice to you?
(a beat, lying) They've all been really..
welcoming. PUSH IN ON BELLA'S FACE, getting mad all over again as.. .

head_text.subj: FLASH POP TO -EDWARD'S FACE, HIS COAL BLACK EYES, THE FUR

text: ON BELLA, sitting atop a table, an open book in her lap. eyes are on the arriving kids, and the parking lot as the in. She's waiting for Edward. Jessica, Angela, Mike and Eric kick around a soccerball  nearby. They wave Bella to join them but she smiles,  declining... and returns to watching for Edward. Her face tells us she's ready for a confrontation.
Bella strides in... but stops, surprised to find her lab  table empty. Off Bella, frustrated.. .

head_text.subj: BEGIN A SERIES OF SCENES OVER SEVERAL DAYS

text: Bella sits with Jessica and Angela who watch a YouTube vi on their phone. Bella gives it a cursory look, but is  focused on the Cullen table --only four of them. Edward's seat is empty..
Bella washes her hands, then looks up at the mirror, star find Rosalie and Alice behind her. They study Bella, Rosa with chillingly cold eyes, Alice with curiosity. Bella, u hurries out.

Bella exits with Angela, Mike, Jessica and Eric, becoming of this circle.  18. She now only glances at Rosalie's car, a red M3 BMW, as i past, noting, again, four Cullens, no Edward. Bella retur her friends, finally forgetting about him.. . SERIES OF SCENES ENDS as we go to
It's neater, rearranged more attractively. Clearly, Bella given it her touch. She sweeps through, folding Charlie's fleece jacket, straightening up. She grabs her book bag
Dad, I'm heading out.
ON BELLA'S FACE as she opens the door and stops, dismay filling her. It's pouring down rain --the yard is full of puddles, some frozen. Bella shivers, wraps her coat tight
Great.  WHIP PAN to the driveway as Charlie pulls in -driving her truck.
Dad, I can drive myself to school. As she walks down the steps, she doesn't realize, somethi watching her -
--tracking Bella's every move as she slips and falls on  a patch of ice -
BACK ON BELLA - fallen on her ass. Charlie climbs out of truck, helps her up.
You okay, Bells?
Ice doesn't help the uncoordinated.
That's why I got you new tires.  She looks over at the truck -- yep, four new tires.
The other ones were nearly bald.  19.
You got me new tires. No one's  ever done that before. Charlie looks at her, confused.
I mean... nothing. He clearly doesn't get it as heads toward his Cruiser.
I'll be late for dinner. I'm heading  down to Mason County. A security guard  at the Grisham Mill got killed by some  kind of animal.. . UNKNOWN POV - ON BELLA AND CHARLIE, as he speaks.. .
An animal?
You're not in Phoenix any more,  honey. They've been hunting it for  a week with no luck. Thought I'd  lend a hand.
Be careful.
Always am. BACK ON BELLA..
And thank you. For the tires. He sees emotion in her eyes. Doesn't understand it, but n heads inside. Bella looks at the tires again, oddly moved .
Rain beats on the roof as Eric walks Bella into class. Sh brushes water off her coat as he chats her up.
... and yeah, prom committee is  a  chick thing, but I gotta cover it  for the paper anyway, and they need  a guy to help choose the music -
So I need your play list
Bella is about to respond when Mike comes up behind her.
Come on, Arizona. Give it up for  the rain. And he shakes his wet baseball cap onto Bella's head.

Terrific.  She heads toward her seat, brushing off her hair. But she freezes when she sees --Edward.  Bella straightens, girding herself. Then strides to the  table, and confidently drops her books down, ready to add him. But he looks up at her
Hello. Bella stops. Stunned. He is direct, precise, as if every  word is an effort for him.
I didn't have a chance to introduce  myself last week. My name is  Edward Cullen.  She's too shocked that he's talking to her to answer.
(prompting) ... You're Bella.
I'm... yes.  Feeling like an idiot, she quickly sits. He abruptly move the extreme edge of his seat. She's even more baffled now

(to the class) Onion root tip cells! That's  what's on your slides. Separate  and label them into the phases of  mitosis. The first partners to get  it right, win... the golden onion!  He excitedly holds up a spray painted onion. Everyone jus looks at him. He's disappointed by their apathy.
Come on, people. Tick tock. 21. Everyone sets to work. Edward pushes the microscope to  Bella, keeping his distance, his voice controlled.
Ladies first.  She grabs the microscope defensively and snaps the first in, adjusting the lens. She's curt as she addresses him.
You've been gone.
Out of town. For personal reasons. She glances at him but he just leans far away, his face  tight. She looks back into the microscope.
Prophase.  She begins to remove the slide.
May I look? She slides him the microscope. He glances through the len
Prophase.
(muttering) Like I said. He writes it on the worksheet. Then he takes a breath, as trying calm himself, and turns to her with enormous effor
Enjoying the rain?
Seriously? You're asking me about the  weather?
It appears.

No. I don't like the cold. Or the  wet. Or the gray. Or parkas. Or  turtle necks.  Is that a smile playing on his lips? For the first time, seems more intrigued than agonized. He studies her. She s can't tell if he despises her or not. It's infuriating. 22.
What? He shakes his head and turns to the microscope, switching the slides. She looks at him. And keeps looking..
His cheekbones, his lips. So perfect, like a sculpture.. .
Anaphase.  She snaps out of it. Covers with a dry look.
May I?  (she looks through the  lens) Anaphase.
Like I said. She glances at him, and this time sees a smirk. She simpl holds out her hand for another slide.
(handing her the slide) If you hate cold and rain, why move to  the wettest place in the continental U.S.
It's complicated.
I think I can keep up. He actually seems interested. She looks into the microsco
My mother remarried.
Very complex. So you don't like him.
Phil is fine. Young for her, but  nice enough. (re: the slide) Interphase.
Bella exits holding the golden onion, and practically run into Edward, who's directly in front of her.
Why didn't you stay with your mom  and stepdad? He waits for her answer, studying her, as if trying to de her. She's drawn in by his attention, oddly compelled.
Alright, Phil's a minor league  baseball player, so he travels  a  lot. My mother stayed home with me  but it made her unhappy. So
decided to spend time with my  father.
But now you're unhappy.
No... I -- I just.. . Bella turns away -- embarrassed, vulnerable.
I'm just trying to figure you out.  You're very hard to read. He's clearly trying to read her now... their eyes meet ag But now she looks more closely at him.
Did you get contacts?
Your eyes were black before, now  they're this golden brown or
It's just the fluorescents. He abruptly turns and walks away. As he does, Bella notes
HIS HANDS clenched into tight fists. Off Bella, utterly  bewildered, both intrigued and frustrated.

The rain has stopped, but the parking lot is full of wate and patches of black ice.  24. Shivering, Bella heads for her truck, carrying the onion, carefully navigating the icy puddles. As she reaches her  truck, she looks across the lot  EDWARD stands by his silver Volvo with his siblings, abou climb in. A moment as their eyes meet... then he looks to sound of a high pitched SCREECH, that quickly grows LOUDE
Bella turns to see a VAN -- skidding on the ice, careenin control, heading directly for her. TIME suddenly fracture compressing to stillness, then exploding in bursts of spe
-- THE FACES OF THE STUDENTS - in shock, seeing what's co --THE VAN DRIVER'S FACE -TYLER, desperately trying to gai control, then shielding his face. -- EDWARD'S FACE - looking at Bella with horror..

THE VAN is about to hit Bella's truck, with her standing between, when suddenly, something knocks Bella down, pinn her to the ground. She looks up - Edward is on top of her The world around them FREEZES -- in this fraction of  a  second, their proximity is overwhelming, electrifying. He breathes in her scent, she takes in his flawless face.. . Abruptly, we BLAST BACK TO SPEED as several things happen quickly, we, and Bella, are unsure what's going on: -- THE VAN SMASHES into the back of Bella's truck
-- Then SPINS around, once again careening toward her and Edward, then suddenly

--EDWARD'S HANDS are creating a deep dent in the side of van's body as it shudders to a stop, a foot from Bella.  -- Edward literally pushes the van away. Then silence. A long beat, void of any sound, as Bella lo Edward, trying to absorb what just happened. Edward's fea her is still alive on his face. She starts to speak but.. . THE SCREAMING begins, yelling, calls for help. People lea Tyler's aid, run to Bella and Edward. Bella SEES the onio ground, smashed as she would have been. As everyone sweep Edward moves into the b.g. Mike and Eric run to Bella
Are you okay!? Are you What happened!? Did anyone  hurt?! see what happened?
Amid the chaos, Bella sees EDWARD'S SIBLINGS looking at Edward. But they show no hint of concern for his safety.  Instead, they look at him with disapproval... and fury.
The double doors BURST open as Charlie runs in, face whit with terror. He spots
BELLA - sitting on a gurney, the E.R. DOCTOR looking into eyes with a pen light. On the next gurney over, Tyler, th van's driver, lies with a mild head wound. Charlie rushes
Bells. Are you alright?
I'm fine, dad. Calm down.

No! But she clings tighter. Terrified. They climb in altitude Higher and higher, above the fog layer. Finally, up ahead

THE FOREST'S EDGE fast approaches, a clearing is beyond. sunlight glows white hot beyond the trees... they're abou emerge from the shadowy darkness... but suddenly- Bella finds herself sitting on the ground, against a tree All is silent. She's dizzy, tries to regain her equilibri Then she realizes she's alone.
Edward? Where are you? She rises, then steps just beyond the fringe of the ferns
A perfect circle of swaying grass, wildflowers and butter sunlight. HEAR a stream nearby. Bella looks around and fi sees

EDWARD, his shirt open, standing nearby in the shade of s trees. He watches her cautiously. She takes a step toward him, but he holds up a hand. She waits. Finally, he takes a  deep breath, and steps out of the shade
This is why we don't show ourselves  in sunlight..
As the sun hits him... EDWARD'S SKIN literally sparkles a embedded with thousands of tiny diamonds. He is magnifice shimmering, like a statue carved from glittering crystal. moves toward her.  53.
This is what I am. He nears, clearly expecting her to recoil, but..
You're... beautiful.. . He realizes that she's in awe. She reaches to touch him, he immediately backs into the shadows, his skin normal ag
(appalled) Beautiful? I'm a killer, Bella.  This is the skin of a killer.  His arm juts into A SHAFT OF LIGHT, sparkling again.
I don't believe that.
Because you believe the lie. The  camouflage. I'm the world's most  dangerous predator. Everything  about me invites you in - my voice,  my face, even my smell. As if
need any of that.. . He's suddenly BEHIND her --then IN FRONT of her --then by a tree, DARTING so fast, we only see where he lands

As if you could outrun me. As if  you could fight me off. He abruptly rips off a LARGE TREE LIMB, then THROWS it ag a  tree trunk with explosive force.  Bella flinches, but holds her ground, unshakable.
I'm designed to kill.
I don't care.
I've killed people.
It doesn't matter. 54.
I wanted to kill you. I've never wanted a human's blood so much in  my life. I'm dangerous to you.
I trust you.
Don't.
I trust you, Edward. I'm here. She takes his hand. He reels at the warmth of her touch.  She leans in, drawn to him, unaware that her THROAT is  nearing his lips... then suddenly he's gone.
Edward? She looks over to FIND he's on the other side of the mead catching his breath.
You... took me by surprise.  (collecting himself) I don't know how to... do this. He moves back toward her. Slowly.
Me, and my family, we're different  from others of our kind. We're not  nomadic, we have a permanent home.  We only hunt animals. We've  learned to control our thirst..
(shaking his head) But you - your scent, it's like  a  drug to me... my own personal brand  of heroin.
(realizing) Oh... I thought you hated me when we met.
I did. For making me want you so badly.  I'm still not sure I can control myself. He reaches her again.
I know you can. 55. He's utterly vulnerable as he looks at her, searching her face for clues.
I wish I could understand this  thing you see in me. You look at  me with those eyes..
(frustrated) I can't read your mind. Tell me  what you're thinking.
I'm afraid. Stricken, he sinks gracefully to his knees in the grass.
(devastated) Good.  She sinks down in front of him.
Not of that. I'm afraid... you'll  disappear. That I'll lose you.
(amazed, elated) You don't know how long I've looked  for you. They share a smile. Then he reaches toward her neck,  pausing.. .

Be very still. She does so. Exercising great control, he places his hand her throat... it's so exposed, so vulnerable. The rush between them is overwhelming. But Bella doesn't move. He brushes his hand up her cheek. Then lowers it to her  heart... Clouds float past the sun.. . They're both overwhelmed, taking each other in.
And so the lion fell for the lamb.
Stupid lamb.
Sick masochistic lion. 56. CRANE UP on the two of them, laying together, as close as they dare... his hand to her heart.. .
CLOSE ON BELLA'S FACE. Still in bed. Thinking. BELLA (V.O.
About three things I was absolutely  positive. One, Edward was  a  vampire.  She rises, goes to the mirror. Looks at herself, worry  knitting her brow. BELLA (V.O.
Two, there was a part of him that  thirsted for my blood. And three.. . As she moves past her window, something catches her eye, her to BANG into her desk. She looks back out..
Edward leans against his car, looking up at her with a sm smile. She beams at the sight of him.  BELLA (V.O.
... I was falling, unconditionally  and irrevocably, in love with him.
Edward helps Bella balance-walk across an enormous fallen tree in the moss-covered forest.
How long have you been like this?
Since nineteen-eighteen. That's  when Carlisle found me.  She takes that in, it's a lot. But it stokes her curiosit
Where'd he find you?
In a hospital, dying of Spanish  influenza. My parents had already died.  57. FLASHBACK to CHICAGO HOSPITAL, 1918 - NIGHT BELLA (V.O.
What was it like? EDWARD (V.O.
The word excruciating comes to  mind. But what Carlisle did was  much harder... not many of us have  the restraint to do that.  BELLA (V.O.
Didn't he just... bite?
Not just. Our bite contains venom.  And once we taste blood, a sort of..
frenzy begins. It's almost  impossible to stop.  BELLA (V.O.
But Carlisle did.
First with me, then with his wife,  Esme. He found her in a hospital,  as well. The others followed. BACK to PRESENT DAY
Does someone have to be dying to  become like you?.. . Their CONVERSATION CONTINUES as we go to
They walk along a stunning coastline -- rugged black rock covered in bright green moss.
... No, that's just Carlisle. He  would never do... this, to someone  who had another choice.
So Carlisle's the reason why you  hunt animals, instead of people.
Not the only reason. He stops, looks down at her, serious, with emotion.. .
I don't want to be a monster. She nods. Understands. He smiles.

We call ourselves vegetarians, by  the way... For our kind, hunting  animals is like living on tofu. It  keeps you strong but isn't very  satisfying.  Then abruptly, he whips past Bella. She turns to see him on a large rock in the river.
Show off.
It's not that impressive, really.  Anyone in my family can do this.
Can they all read minds, too?
No, that's unique to me. But Alice can  see the future.
(fishing) Really? Bet she saw me coming  a  mile away. She notes his change of mood as he slows, darkening.
Her visions are very subjective.  The future can change. He cuts off her questions by returning to shore, and  continuing their walk.. .
Water sprays from a hose as Bella and Edward wash her tru A boom box PLAYS. He perches on top of the roof.
Come to my house tomorrow.  Bella looks up, aiming the hose badly - water ricochets o the cab and sprays in her face. He jumps down from the ro
Your house? With your family? 59. He wipes down the dented front fender, then reaches under and, with his bare hands, easily pops a large DENT out of truck's body. She's too flustered to register it.
But... what if they don't like me?
(laughing heartily) You're worried, not because you'll  be in a houseful of vampires, but  because you think they won't  approve of you?
I'm glad I amuse you. But then his laughter dies, as he hears something.
What is it?
A complication. ... as a BLACK CAR comes into view, and pulls up.
I'll pick you up tomorrow. He heads to his car, eying the passengers in

Jacob, with his father, Billy, who's expression is intens Anxious. SLOW MOTION as Edward locks eyes with Billy. Jac looks questioningly at his father. Bella watches Edward drive away, perturbed by the exchang forces a smile and goes to greet the visitors. Jacob sets Billy's wheelchair and Billy climbs into it as
Come to visit your truck?
Looks good. You got that dent out.
Actually, we came to visit your  flat screen. First Mariners game  of the season. Plus Jacob here  kept bugging me to see you again. 60.
(mortified) Great, Dad. Thanks.  Jacob shoots his father an irritated look, just as the PO CRUISER pulls up. Charlie climbs out, holding two six-pac
Pale Ale.
(holds up a brown paper
Harry Clearwater's homemade fish fry. Charlie smiles, pleased. He clicks on the game as they al inside
Any luck with the Waylon case?
(darkening) Found a footprint out at the crime  scene today. A bare, human footprint.  Billy seems disturbed but not surprised. Bella is horrifi
A person did that?
A crazy person, walking around  barefoot this time of year.
Spread the word out at the rez, will  ya? Keep the kids out of the woods.
Will do.  (directed at Bella) Don't want no one else getting hurt. Bella looks away from Billy, unnerved.
Bella floats near Edward, only their hands touching, but  their bodies are nearing, so close, so sensual..
Suddenly, EDWARD IS YANKED DOWNWARD! Something has him,  pulling him down..
-- as her eyes pop open... and relief sweeps over her as realizes it was just a dream. But it haunts her.. . 80

AERIAL SHOT of the forest as we sweep over its lush green expanse, to FIND Edward's Volvo speeding along, very fast The Volvo finally turns off the paved highway and onto a serpentine dirt road. FOLLOW THE CAR until, finally, it  reaches a small meadow, in the center of which sits
A timeless graceful house. The Volvo pulls up and Bella  climbs out, surprised.
It's... wonderful.
You expected turrets, dungeons and moats?
No... not moats. He takes her hand. She girds herself. They head inside. 82

Edward guides Bella into the large, bright house. Walls o look out on the river. Everything's open and white. Histo objects are tastefully placed throughout.  HEAR Verdi's La Traviata: Libiamo ne' lieti calici coming another room. Bella is enraptured.
It's so light and open.
Thanks to tinted windows... It's the one  place we never have to hide. We then notice CLANGING coming from the kitchen. Edward  shakes his head.
I told them not to do this. 62.

Verdi's opera BLASTS Bella and Edward who enter to find t kitchen in full swing. Dr. Cullen, Emmett, Rosalie, and E prepare elaborate platters of Italian pastas and antipast Esme rolls out a pizza dough and fans tomatoes around it instant. Rosalie stirs a pot, disinterested.  Esme sees Bella and stops, emanating maternal warmth. Her heart-shaped face and billows of hair are reminiscent of silent-movie era.
Bella. We're making Italiano for  you.
This is Esme, my mother for all  intents and purposes.
Bon giorno?
Molto bene!

You've given us an excuse to use  the kitchen for the first time.  Hit pause.. . PAN across brand new Williams-Sonoma cookware boxes to th corner --they're watching an ITALIAN COOKING SHOW on a TV Emmett hits the DVD remote control.
I hope you're hungry.
Oh, absolutely
She already ate. Bella shoots him a look, but something SHATTERS. Rosalie thrown down a bowl and now strides out
Perfect. 63.
-- Bella exits behind Rosalie, trying to explain. The  other's follow -
I just assumed -- because you don't  eat, you know.. .
Of course. That was very considerate  of you.
(re: Rosalie) Ignore her. I do.
Yes, let's keep pretending this  isn't dangerous for all of us.
I would never, ever tell anyone.
(reassuring) She knows that.
The problem is, you two have gone  public now, so.. .
Emmett.
No, she should know. (to Bella) The entire family will be  implicated if this ends badly.
... Badly? This hangs in the air, uncomfortably. Edward can't look a

(realizing) Oh. Badly. Like, where I become  a  meal. Emmett chokes back laughter. Edward grins. Wraps his arm  around Bella. Even Esme has to chuckle. Rosalie, exasperated, heads back into the kitchen. Emmett shrugs, goes after her. 64. ALICE (O.S.
Hi, Bella! ON THE BALCONY Alice leaps over the rail, holding a bouqu of wildflowers. Jasper follows her. She bounces forward t kiss Bella's cheek and hands Bella the wildflowers.
I'm Alice. You do smell good.
Alice.
It's alright, Bella and I are going  to be great friends.
(extending her hand) And you're Jasper, right?
Pleasure to meet you. But he shies away from her hand.
(gently encouraging) You won't hurt her, Jasper. He isn't so sure. Edward takes Bella's hand instead.
I'll give you a tour of the house.

(with meaning) I'll see you soon. Edward shoots Alice a look, which Bella catches before he her up the stairs. As they ascend, Bella takes in the ecl ART PIECES from around the world, Ethiopian crosses, Dres China, Asian scrolls. They reach
THE LANDING - to FIND a wall of dozens of artistically ar silk squares with tassels. Bella looks closer.
Graduation caps?
A private joke. We matriculate a lot.
What a nightmare, repeating high school.  65.
True, but the younger we start out in  a  new place, the longer we can stay there. She shivers at the thought of it, as they continue on.. .
... and this is my room. Bella enters to find a wall of glass doors open to a deck the river beyond. The rest is floor to ceiling CD's, viny 8 track tapes, etc., with a sophisticated I-pod/stereo set
So you're obsessed with music. But.. . (looking around) No bed?
No sleep.
Ever?
No nightmares, no drool, no  snoring. She considers this, as she runs a hand along a wall of CD studying the titles.
Do you have any favorites?
Depends. Alternative? Jazz?  Sixties, seventies.. .
Ooh, she knows her music. Alright,  nineties. Eighteen-nineties. Classical.
I'd have to say... Debussy. He looks at her, surprised, smiles.
My favorite, too.  Off their connection, he pulls out a CD and puts it on.
solo piano version of CLAIR DE LUNE begins to play. 66. He moves to her, taking her hand, then he starts to turn in a pirouette, dancing with her - but she breaks off and backs away.
No dancing.
Ever?
No tripping, no falling, no derision.
(mischievously) I can always make you.
You don't scare me.
You really shouldn't have said that. He grins, a low GROWLING SOUNDS in the back of his throat She laughs and backs out the door, onto
-- Bella backs up to the rail. Edward appears in the  doorway, shifting into a half-crouch, about to pounce.
Don't you dare - Suddenly, she's airborne as he tackles her and they FLY O DECK... then she finds herself
IN A TREE - in his arms. When she realizes where she is, laughs, delighted. It's infectious, he laughs heartily, t .
Esme and Dr. Cullen look out the window. Edward's LAUGHTE filters inside to them; Esme, in turn, smiles.
She's brought him to life.
He's been alone too long... but how  can it end well?
Alice has been wrong before. 67.
Not often. Esme turns to Dr. Cullen, gentle but absolutely firm.
Carlisle. Bella is what he wants.  It will work out. Somehow.  Dr. Cullen smiles at her with love, then takes her hand a they look back out the window.. .
Edward looks Bella in the eye.
Trust me?
In theory.
Then close your eyes. She does, warily. He grips her more firmly, then LEAPS th another tree like a flying squirrel! Then, again, to the another tree. He easily gets a foothold, while holding Be

Open. She does... to the most astonishing bird's eye VIEW of th valley, river, and the mountains beyond. CAMERA whirls ar them allowing us a 360 degree view of their surroundings. Bella's intoxicated face.. .
Jessica pops a volleyball in the air, doing practice serv Angela takes a picture of her, then points her camera aro looking for another shot. Eric studies some fliers  advertising the prom.
Monte Carlo? That's our prom  theme?
Gambling, tuxedos and -
(ala Sean Connery) Bond. James -- ow! -- as Jessica head-butts the ball which hits him in the f 68.
Oh. My. God. Angela, scanning for a shot, has frozen. Jessica and Eric
-- arriving together. All eyes on campus are turning to  them, filled with curiosity, jealousy, envy.
Everyone's staring.
Not that guy over -- yeah, he just  looked. Off his rakish, but reassuring smile.. . 89
Moving fast, tracking. INCLUDE CHARLIE holding the leash
--It's a hunting party, several dogs, half a dozen armed
Guys, we got something
The Deputies hurry to Charlie. They gather around
A FOOTPRINT. The dogs start pulling them in a certain  direction. As the posse takes off at a sprint
We watch Charlie and the posse move away... REVERSE to fi
Laurent stands next to him. Victoria jogs up.
They took the bait.
By tomorrow they'll be half way to  Winnipeg.  Victoria lasciviously grabs James' shirt. Pulls him to he

I love when men chase me. 69. He grins, then starts taking off her clothes. They pull e other toward the woods with carnal lust. It barely regist with Laurent, who continues to watch the posse with conce
Bella hurries toward the entrance, trying to keep the joy face in check... with minimal success. Outside the door, passes Mike, hanging out with several of his basketball T
Yo, Arizona. So. You and Cullen. She shrugs, non-committal, but can't entirely hide a smil as she hurries inside to Charlie's table and slides in.
Sorry I'm late. Biology project.  Cora sets a top sirloin steak in front of Charlie, and pl of seafood in front of Bella.
Ordered you the seafood combo.
Order one for yourself next time.  You should cut back on the steak.
I'm healthy as a horse.

(concerned) Say Chief, boys want to know, you  find anything down by Queets River  today? Charlie's aware of the LOGGERS at the counter listening, He frames his answer carefully to keep everyone calm.
The suspect's moving east. Kitsap  County Sheriff is taking over from  here. They're putting extra guys on.
Hope they catch him fast. She moves off, with a measure of relief. Charlie and Bell pass each other the salt, butter for bread, etc., with an easy rhythm now.
Your friends are flagging you. 70. She turns to see Mike and the guys horsing around outside straws in their noses, making faces at her. She smiles.
It's okay you wanna join them. I'm  just gonna turn in early anyway.
Yeah, me, too.
It's a Friday night. Go out. The  Newton boy's got a big smile for  you. Nice family, the Newtons.
He's just a friend.
None of the boys in town interest you?
We're not really going to talk  about boys, are we?
Just... you should be around people.  I leave you alone too much.
(with genuine affection) I've never minded being alone. Guess  I'm a lot like my dad that way.  Charlie smiles. These two have come a long way. Cora retu
Berry cobbler, two forks. She sets it between them. Off them, both reaching for for .
Bella, dressed for bed, looks out the window as she talks phone with Rene. Bella's euphoria still lingers in her ey .
So spring training's going well?
Rene talks on her cell. Phil is in the background, post-b practice, chowing down with a couple of teammates. 71.
Phil's working hard. We're looking  around for a house to rent, in case  it becomes permanent. You'd like  Jacksonville, baby.
Actually, Forks is kind of growing on me.
(stops, knows there's  more) Could... a guy have something to do  with that?
(small smile) Maybe.. .
Tell me everything! Jock? Indie? Bet  he's smart. Is he smart?
(trying to avoid lies) Well... he is kind of a history buff. -- this as she turns to find
EDWARD LYING ON HER BED, smiling. She nearly drops the ph
I, uh... have to go.
No way, we gotta talk boys. Are  you being safe? Edward shoots her a look, he heard that. She's mortified.
I'll call you later, Mom.  STAY ON BELLA who hangs up.
How did you get in here?
The window. As always.
You've been here before?
What else is there to do at night?  72. She pushes him. He grabs her hand and playfully pulls her onto the bed, wrestling as
You're a peeping Tom! Perv!
Shh! The Chief will hear you! But the electricity of their physical contact quickly ove them, their laughter quieting. He studies her face.
I just... like watching over you.  He raises his fingers to her lips, sending a thrill up he
There's something I'd like to try.  She nods, bedazzled by him. He takes her face in his hand hesitates to test himself, then he softly kisses her..

What neither of them is prepared for is her response. Her breath comes in a wild GASP. Her fingers knot in his hair clutching him to her. Lips part as she breathes his scent . Then his hands gently, but forcefully push her face back. opens her eyes to see that his eyes are wild, his jaw cle
(mortified) Oh... I'm... oh. He relaxes slightly, looking at her blushing face.
I'm stronger than I thought.
Wish I could say the same. I'm so  embarrassed.
Don't be. But we have to be careful. (serious) I can never lose control with you. Ever.  She nods, then carefully lies on his chest. He wraps his around her. Off the two of them.. .
Bella enters to find Charlie cleaning a rifle. He starts say hello but she just blurts out -
I have a date with Edward Cullen. He suddenly looks like he's having an aneurysm.
He's too old for you.
We're both juniors. I thought you  liked the Cullens.
And I thought you weren't interested in  any of the boys in town.
Edward doesn't live in town. And  it's in the early stage and -
whatever, he's outside right now.
Now? He's out there?
He wants to meet you. Officially.
Good. He cocks the rifle in mock-seriousness.
Be nice, okay? He's... important. Charlie gives his daughter a reassuring nod... then she o the door to REVEAL Edward in a parka and gloves.
Chief Swan. I wanted to formally  introduce myself. I'm Edward. Edward extends his hand. Charlie takes it, but grunts  a  hello, resisting him.
I won't keep Bella out late  tonight. We're just going to go  play baseball with my family.
Bella's going to play baseball? Bella's equally surprised, but hides it. 74.
Yes, sir, that's the plan.
Well. More power to you, I guess.
(looks him in the eyes) She'll be safe with me, sir, I promise. As Edward exits... Charlie holds Bella back.
(sotto) You got that pepper spray?
Dad.
Edward and Bella climb into a massive JEEP parked in the
(amused) Your father thinks you should go to  an all-girl's school.
No fair, reading Charlie's mind.  As they climb in the Jeep, Bella notices a baseball bat
And since when do vampires like baseball?
It's the American pastime. Plus,  there's a thunderstorm coming. It's the  only time we can play. You'll see why.

Storm clouds gather in the sky as Bella and Edward pull u the Jeep. She takes in a rough baseball diamond, set into enormous field in the lap of the Olympic peaks.  Esme and Emmett come to greet Bella.
Good thing you're here. We need  a  umpire.
(big crooked grin) She thinks we cheat. 75.
I know you cheat. Call em as you  see em, Bella. WHIP PAN to Alice on the Pitcher's Mound.
It's time. -- Just as a deep RUMBLE of thunder shakes the forest.

And it's extraordinary. Bella stays by Esme who plays  catcher. Alice pitches with lightning-fast speed. Edward  and Emmett take positions in the outfield.  -- ROSALIE SMASHES the ball with the aluminum bat. It CRA like thunder -- and is followed directly by real THUNDER.
(to Esme) Now I get why you need the thunder. The ball SHOOTS like a meteor deep into the forest, rocke through the trees. Edward disappears after it.
That has to be a home run.
Edward's very fast. Rosalie darts around the bases, almost a blur -- Edward r of the forest with the ball and WHIPS it to home plate. W Esme catches it a millisecond before Rosalie slides in.

Yer out? Esme nods... Amazed, Bella watches as DR. CULLEN hits a l drive. Edward and Emmett race for the catch, DIVING 15 fe and COLLIDING with such might that it sounds like enormou boulders falling. They miss the ball -- Dr. Cullen is saf JASPER WHACKS the next pitch -- deep into the forest. But before Edward can chase it, Alice suddenly GASPS.
Stop! I didn't see them..
They all stop. Edward is immediately at Bella's side. The family instantly gathers at home plate.
They're traveling so quickly
You said they left the county -
They did, but then they heard us.. . (looking at Edward) And changed their minds.
(to Bella) Put your hair down
Like that'll help. I could smell  her from across the field.  Edward ignores Rosalie as he arranges Bella's hair.
I shouldn't have brought you here.  I'm so sorry. She'd ask why, but suddenly, they all turn as one toward
There's a faint rustle... then James, Victoria and Lauren emerge. As they near, Bella SEES their bare feet, then th deep BURGUNDY of their eyes. Laurent holds up the basebal
I believe this belongs to you. He tosses the ball (his casual toss is still blindingly f to Dr. Cullen who easily catches it and smiles politely.
Thank you.
Could you use three more players?
Of course.
I'm Laurent. This is Victoria.  And James.

Would you like to bat first? Laurent picks up a bat. The Cullens take the field. Dr.  Cullen is catcher, Edward is on first, with Bella behind near the Jeep. 77. Bella sees that Edward's eyes are locked onto James. Laur is at bat first.
I'm afraid your hunting activities have  caused something of a mess for us.
Our apologies. We didn't realize  the territory had been claimed.
Yes, we maintain a permanent  residence. The three newcomers exchange a look of surprise.
Really? Well, we won't be a problem  any more.

The humans were tracking us, but we  led them East- Jasper pitches the ball -- Laurent SLAMS it -- but Alice up a tree is a flash and the ball slams into Alice's hand with a THWAP. Laurent is pissed, but James smiles ever so slightly, delighted at the discovery of worthy opponents. James is up next and he POWER-SLAMS IT with AMAZING FORCE . He runs past first, past Edward, past Bella.. . CLOSE ON BELLA -- IN SLOW MOTION as the wind from the bal ruffles her hair, carrying her scent, which floats to
JAMES -- who suddenly SCREECHES to a halt. His head WHIPS around at her and he lurches into a crouch, his nostrils  flaring, excitedly, eyes locked on Bella.

You brought a snack. EDWARD springs in front of Bella, baring his teeth. A tru menacing, feral SNARL rips from his throat. James GROWLS OVERHEAD SHOT: in a flash, the Cullens rush into position behind Edward -- Laurent and Victoria line up behind Jame
The girl is with us. 78.
(trying to defuse  situation) We won't harm her.
(hungry for battle) Just try it.
I think it best if you leave.

Yes, I can see the game is over.  We'll go now. James? But James' eyes don't leave Edward's. Laurent puts a hand James' shoulder, and finally, James backs into the woods his cohorts, disappearing. Once they're gone, Esme  immediately gathers up the bats-
Get Bella out of here. We'll follow  them.  Dr. Cullen, Jasper and a resentful Rosalie race off after three vampires. Edward scoops Bella up as we
Edward whips Bella into the Jeep and straps her in -
James is a tracker. I saw his mind.  The hunt is his obsession, and my  reaction set him off -
-- The tires spin as Edward WHIPS the jeep around

-- We're a large clan of strong fighters  all protecting one vulnerable human.  (dark with disgust) I just made this his most exciting  game ever. Bella blanches with the dawning realization of what she h wrought up on them all as.. .

head_text.subj: THE JEEP CAREENS DOWN THE DIRT MOUNTAIN ROAD

text: A jolting, death defying ride, SPLASHING through creeks, they reach
THE JEEP speeds wildly down the road.
The first place he'll go is your  house. He'll track your scent  there.
(horrified) What?!? Charlie's there. He's in  danger because of me. Because of  us!
(calmly) Then we'll lead the tracker away  from him. Somehow. He angrily WHIPS around a bend, MUD FLYING
Charlie watches a baseball game on T.V. as the door sudde BURSTS open to reveal Bella, crying, and Edward, devastat
I said, leave me alone!
Bella, don't do this. Just think  about it, please
Get out! It's over. She SLAMS the door. Charlie has risen, baffled, concerned
Bella? What happened?
I have to get out of this place.  Out of Forks. I'm leaving. Now. Bella runs upstairs. Charlie hurries after her
Bella slams the door behind her. REVEAL Edward's already pulling things from her drawers and shoving them into a d faster than humanly possible. Bella leans against the doo 80.
(a pained whisper) I can't hurt him. Edward gives her a look, you have to. There's a KNOCK. INTERCUT Charlie on the other side. It's agony for both o
Bells. Did he hurt you?
No, Dad.
Then what? Did he break up with you?
I broke up with him.
I thought you liked him?
That's why I have to leave. I don't  want this. I want to go home.

(whispering) I'll be in the truck. And he disappears out the window. Bella gathers strength continue her performance. She opens the door to reveal Ch He follows as she carries her duffle and truck keys into
Bella charges down the stairs -- Charlie follows.
Your mother's not even in Phoenix.
She'll come home. I'll call her  from the road.
You can't drive home now. I'll take  you to the airport in the morning.
I want to drive. I need time to  think. I'll pull into a motel in  a  few hours. I promise. She heads down the stairs. Charlie follows..

Like watch more baseball on the flat  screen? Or go to the Coffee Shop?  Same people, same steak, same berry  cobbler every night? That's you,  Dad. Not me. This hits Charlie hard. She can barely stand it, heads do the stairs, as he takes a second to recover.. .
Bella... I just got you back. Which breaks Bella's heart... and forces her to deliver t final blow.
And if I don't get out now, I'm  going get stuck here like mom did. Charlie is stunned, wounded. She takes advantage of his  shock, pushing past him out the door.
Bella exits, heads to her truck. Fresh tears spring to he eyes.
Trees, branches... and a pair of DEADLY EYES. James. He w from a distance as Bella pulls out. The truck moves off.. so does James, leaving Charlie alone with his pain, stari the window.

His face... I said the same words  my mother used when she left him.

Suddenly, BOOM! - a dark figure LEAPS onto the bed of the truck. Bella SCREAMS.
It's alright. It's just Emmett.  Alice is in the car behind us.  She catches her breath. It kills him to see her so fright She looks out the window as they drive through town..
The small, insulated town passes by in SLOW MOTION... INS SEE Mike, Jessica, Eric and Angela laughing, flirting, in hopeful.. .

I've grown tired of his games. But  he's got unparalleled senses.  Absolutely lethal. I've never seen  anything like him in three hundred  years ... And the woman, Victoria,  will back him. Don't underestimate  her. 83. Dr. Cullen nods thanks. Laurent looks at Edward, apologet
I'm truly sorry for what's been  unleashed here. And he moves off, disappearing into the woods.. .

(with bloodlust) We'll rip him apart with our hands,  then burn the pieces
I don't relish killing another creature.  Even a sadistic one like James.
If he doesn't get to one of us  first.
(horrified) This is insane. You can't put yourselves  in danger like this - for me.
Too late. Edward shoots Rosalie a look, but he grabs two sets of ke off a hook, throwing one set, lightning fast, to Dr. Cull
I'll run Bella south, while you lead  the tracker away
No, Edward -- the tracker thinks  you won't leave Bella. He'll  follow you.
I'll go with Bella. Jasper and
will drive her south. (facing him) I'll keep her safe, Edward. Edward agonizes. Frustrated. Alice steps forward.

(studies her, torn) Can you keep your thoughts to yourself? She nods. An unspoken agreement. Edward finally surrender his keys to Alice. Then he opens one of Bella's suitcases pulling out clothes, tossing them to
Esme, Rosalie, put these on so the  tracker will pick up Bella's scent.
(dropping the clothes) Why should I? What is she to me? Just  a danger you've inflicted on us

(spinning on her) Rosalie. Bella is with Edward. She's  a part of this family now. And we  protect our family.  She glowers, but picks up the clothes. If any of you get hurt because of me
We won't, there are five of us, two of  them. When it's done, I'll come get you.  He pulls her closer, looking into her eyes.

text: -- show us the landscape as it changes from dark green  forests to stretches of grassy hillsides, to drier, brown surroundings, until night falls and headlights lights fla by us. Finally, we land in.. .

will go somewhere. Together. The  others will keep hunting. (then, determined) Bella, I swear to you, I'll do whatever  it takes to make you safe again.  Off Bella, her eyes welling.. .

love seems like a good way to go..

ballet bar wraps around the walls -

Then she runs, as James REELS back briefly. But he leaps  over her and lands RIGHT IN FRONT OF HER.  Amused, he flings her across the floor like a bowling bal She SMASHES hard into a mirrored column. Edward's rage ERUPTS -- he climbs out of the window casem and SUICIDE-DIVE-BOMBS James, savagely PLOWING him throug the floorboards. ON BELLA -- as the venom travels through her veins. want to talk to him. Apologize.

couldn't stop -

don't want

Dad.

You really are trying to kill me.

Rosalie glances over; indifference has replaced fury. But Alice waves brightly. Bella returns it with a smile as we hear a crossfade into the next track-

(laughs, then realizes) You're serious. He doesn't wait for an answer, more or less CARRIES her t the DANCE FLOOR -- then places her feet atop his own... a starts to move. She actually begins to enjoy it.

At prom. As they dance, she feels his grace, his strength. Becomes thoughtful. Finally, she looks at him. 102.

Yes. He lowers his lips to her neck. One bite is all it would 103.

You're going to have a long and  happy life with me. Isn't that  enough? She looks at him... and finally smiles.
For now. They WHIRL around, gliding on his grace, never looking aw one another, as we CRANE UP on them, in each other's arms .

No one will surrender tonight. But  I won't give in. I know what I want. CONTINUE UP AND BACK on the dance floor.
